entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as having arrived at a meeting.

entities.name: Mundungus
entities.description: A person who is part of the group and is described as grubby and bloodshot-eyed.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: A person who is part of the group and is mentioned as agreeing with Mundungus.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: A person who is part of the group and is described as giggling at Mundungus.

entities.name: The Phoenix
entities.description: A symbol that is mentioned in the title of the story.

relationships.description: Mundungus stares at Harry through his matted ginger hair.
Mundungus uses a grimy black pipe and takes a deep pull on it.
